name: Odd Fellow Company x Draught Dry Goods - Wool Jacket
description: 100% virgin wool (Pendleton) slim-fit jacket with cotton floral interior. - 100% wool trim - Button cuffs - Solid brass hardware - Leather welted pockets - Interior pocket - 100% cotton floral lining - Loose-looped 'PLEASURE PERMANENT' embroidered on back Designed and produced in collaboration with Odd Fellow Company in Portland, Oregon. Fit guide is here: http://draughtdrygoods.com/faq Made in the USA Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment

name: Odd Fellow Company x Draught Dry Goods - Waxed Varsity
description: 10oz waxed canvas slim-fit varsity jacket with cotton floral interior. Features: - Spring-weight 100% wool cuffs and trim - Solid brass hardware - Buttery leather welted pockets - Interior pocket - Floral lining runs completely through sleeves and is partially visible through semi-opaque sleeves - Very water resistant - No exterior branding Wipes clean with a warm, wet cloth. Designed and produced in collaboration with Odd Fellow Company in Portland, Oregon. Fit guide is here: http://draughtdrygoods.com/faq Made in the USA Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment

name: Nude Beach Tote
description:
Summer is upon us, and a capable tote filled with beach accouterments is a critical part of the experience.  The water-resistant bottom will keep your clothes dry while you romp around in your birthday suit, and the large interior pocket provides easy access to whichever libations or drugs you require to peel off said outfit.  

Details:
Heavy boat tote canvas construction
Soft cotton handles and trim 
Snapping interior pocket
Heavy duty snap closure

Made in USA

Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment

Dimensions:
9" x 16" x 22"

name: Getaway Duffel - Denim w/Camo Interior
description:
Stiff unwashed denim exterior, heavyweight cotton camouflage interior, cotton belly straps, hand-cut, hand-sewn copper riveted leather handles, heavy duty brass zipper.

Designed to to fit one million dollars in cash.

Will emboss initials onto handles at no extra charge.

26” x 10” x 10”

Made one by one in the USA.

Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment.

name: DDG x Potter's Field Ceramics x Tom O'Toole - J Tray
description:
Handmade porcelain ashtray by our friends at Potter's Field Ceramics, featuring the Draught 'Five Finger Discount' illustration in navy by Tom O'Toole.  

One spot for a J.  

Each piece is completely unique, and the process requires some serious laser treatment via Primo Laser Studio, a subsidiary company of  of PFC.  Please allow for potential discoloration and or color bleeding.  It's a complicated glazing process, and very special, deal with it.

Produced top to bottom in Portland, Oregon, USA.

Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment (generally much sooner).

name: Travel Tote - Ripstop Camo
description:
Lightweight Travel Tote in in ripstop camouflage with hunter's orange nylon interior.

Four large exterior pockets, snapping closure at top, poly webbing handles and reinforced rim, taped interior seams, leather pull tab.

Very strong and lightweight, and packs down small enough to accommodate any type of adventure.

Made in USA

Free domestic shipping

Made to order, please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment

name: Cowhide Backpack - Milk
description:
Open Edition

Very supple cowhide backpack in white, with solid brass hardware and oversized brass zipper. Taped interior seams.

Interior leather pocket that hangs from the top interior seam for cell phones and misc. paraphernalia.

Will get undoubtably more beautiful with age.

Made in USA

15" x 18" x 4"

Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment

Interior leather pocket that hangs from the top interior seam for cell phones and misc. paraphernalia.

Will get undoubtably more beautiful with age.

Made in USA

15" x 18" x 4"

name: Waxed Weekender
description:
Perfect for a long weekend or short trip, and not-so-large that it doesn't work as a daily carry.

10oz black and natural waxed canvas, solid brass hardware, 2oz black vegetable tanned belly straps, black 9oz stitched latigo handles, taped interior seams, copper rivets, oversized brass zipper with black YKK zipper pull.

Four large exterior pockets, and adjustable handles.

Interior is hunter's orange water-resistant nylon, which gives the semi-opaque natural waxed canvas a peach glow, and can be easily cleaned. 

Waxed canvas produced domestically, and wipes clean with a warm wet cloth. 

Made in USA

Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment.  

Approximate dimensions:
19" x 16" x 8"

name: Waxed Daily Backpack
description:
10oz black and natural waxed canvas, solid brass hardware, black 9oz black latigo trim, taped interior seams, copper rivets, oversized brass zipper with black YKK zipper pull.

A elegant, water-resistant, and lightweight solution for a daily carry.  Waxed canvas produced domestically, and wipes clean with a warm wet cloth.

Made in USA

Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment.

15" x 18" x 4"

name: Finders Keepers Carry - Black and Mild
description:
10oz black and natural waxed canvas exterior, hunter's orange water-resistant nylon interior, fine 2oz black belly straps, 9oz latigo shoulder straps, solid brass hardware, black D rings, copper rivets.  

Interior is a hunter's orange water-resistant nylon, which gives the semi-opaque natural waxed canvas a peach glow, and can be easily cleaned.

Straps can be arranged to carry as a tote, as a backpack, or across the bag diagonally to sling over shoulder.  Top of the bag folds down to keep out water.

Approximate open dimensions: 22" x 14" x 5"

Made in the USA.

Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment.

name: Idea Carry w/Waxed Envelope - 2 Pack
description:
Waxed Envelope:
10oz black waxed canvas, with natural vegetable tanned tab, brass hardware.  Protects notebooks from scuffs and the elements.

Journal:
50 or so blank cream pages, with cream cover, and copper foil embossing.  Cut and bound by our friends at Publication Studio here in Portland, Oregon.

TWO notebooks included with this purchase.  

Made in the USA

Please allow 2-3 weeks for fulfillment, generally sooner.

name: Idea Carry
description: 50 or so blank cream pages, with cream cover, and copper foil embossing on cover. Cut and bound by our friends at Publication Studio here in Portland, Oregon. Same dimensions as the first edition of the Idea Carry back in 2011, and will fit the old waxed canvas envelope. Made in the USA In Stock, and generally ships within 48 hrs.

name: Waxed Accessory Pouch
description:
10oz black and natural waxed canvas, solid brass hardware, black 9oz black latigo handle, taped interior seams, copper rivet, oversized brass zipper with black YKK zipper pull.

Interior is hunter's orange water-resistant nylon, which gives the semi-opaque natural waxed canvas a peach glow, and can be easily cleaned.

A perfect solution for organizing cords, cameras, and paraphernalia.  Can be carried by itself, or paired with any of our bags.  If you're like us and have many bags, our pouch makes the daily or weekly transition much less painful.  

Our waxed canvas is produced and procured domestically, and wipes clean with a warm wet cloth.

description:
Waxy 6oz mahogany leather construction, brass rivets, brass snaps, solid brass buckle.

Our widest belt at 1.5"

If 'custom fit' is selected, take your most wearable belt and measure from the point at which the leather folds on the buckle to the belt hole that is most comfortable, and provide that number (inches or centimeters) in the notes section when checking out.

name: Gift Certificate Coaster
description:
Giving the gift of a gift certificate made extraordinarily more satisfying with the Gift Certificate Coaster.  

Each coaster is hand-cut with a machine stitch out of 5oz vegetable tanned leather.  

A document is included with the coasters with the gift amount, and instructions to redeem.  

Any gift certificate valued at or over $100 comes with a set of 4.

Each gift certificate is priced with the estimated shipping charge of an item included for their convenience.

Free shipping.  

Made in USA
